Detection of DFSVC.EXE launching child p.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 logs. Filter for processes where ParentProcessName is 'dfsvc.exe'. Analyze the ChildProcessName and CommandLine for suspicious or unknown executables/scripts. Use descriptive statistics to baseline common child processes of dfsvc.exe and flag outliers.

Suspicious command-line executions invol.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 logs. Filter for processes where Image is 'rundll32.exe'. Search the CommandLine for the specific string 'dfshim.dll,ShOpenVerbApplication1'. Identify the process that launched rundll32.exe and analyze the path of the ClickOnce application being launched for suspicious locations or names.
